<a id="EditorResourcePreview"></a>

# EditorResourcePreview

**Inherits:** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A node used to generate previews of resources or files.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This node is used to generate previews for resources or files.

\ **Note:** This class shouldn't be instantiated directly. Instead, access the singleton using [EditorInterface.get_resource_previewer()](EditorInterface.md#EditorInterface_method_get_resource_previewer).

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Signals

<a id="EditorResourcePreview_signal_preview_invalidated"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**preview_invalidated**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePreview_signal_preview_invalidated)

Emitted if a preview was invalidated (changed). `path` corresponds to the path of the preview.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="EditorResourcePreview_method_add_preview_generator"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_preview_generator**\ (\ generator\: [EditorResourcePreviewGenerator](EditorResourcePreviewGenerator.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePreview_method_add_preview_generator)

Create an own, custom preview generator.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourcePreview_method_check_for_invalidation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **check_for_invalidation**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePreview_method_check_for_invalidation)

Check if the resource changed, if so, it will be invalidated and the corresponding signal emitted.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourcePreview_method_queue_edited_resource_preview"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **queue_edited_resource_preview**\ (\ resource\: [Resource](Resource.md), receiver\: [Object](Object.md), receiver_func\: [StringName](StringName.md), userdata\: [Variant](Variant.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePreview_method_queue_edited_resource_preview)

Queue the `resource` being edited for preview. Once the preview is ready, the `receiver`'s `receiver_func` will be called. The `receiver_func` must take the following four arguments: [String](String.md) path, [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) preview, [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) thumbnail_preview, [Variant](Variant.md) userdata. `userdata` can be anything, and will be returned when `receiver_func` is called.

\ **Note:** If it was not possible to create the preview the `receiver_func` will still be called, but the preview will be ``null``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourcePreview_method_queue_resource_preview"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **queue_resource_preview**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md), receiver\: [Object](Object.md), receiver_func\: [StringName](StringName.md), userdata\: [Variant](Variant.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePreview_method_queue_resource_preview)

Queue a resource file located at `path` for preview. Once the preview is ready, the `receiver`'s `receiver_func` will be called. The `receiver_func` must take the following four arguments: [String](String.md) path, [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) preview, [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) thumbnail_preview, [Variant](Variant.md) userdata. `userdata` can be anything, and will be returned when `receiver_func` is called.

\ **Note:** If it was not possible to create the preview the `receiver_func` will still be called, but the preview will be ``null``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourcePreview_method_remove_preview_generator"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_preview_generator**\ (\ generator\: [EditorResourcePreviewGenerator](EditorResourcePreviewGenerator.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePreview_method_remove_preview_generator)

Removes a custom preview generator.
